headline: Assurant Foundation Boosts Support for the NADA Foundation’s Workforce Initiative with $30,000 Contribution
summary: ATLANTA, January 28, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a leading global business services company that supports, protects, and connects major consumer purchases, including automobiles, today announced the Assurant Foundation’s donation of $30,000 to sponsor the National Automobile Dealers Association (NADA) Foundation’s Workforce Initiative, which promotes the value of dealership roles and facilitates access to educational resources.

content.title: Assurant Foundation Boosts Support for the NADA Foundation’s Workforce Initiative with $30,000 Contribution
content.summary: ATLANTA, January 28, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a leading global business services company that supports, protects, and connects major consumer purchases, including automobiles, today announced the Assurant Foundation’s donation of $30,000 to sponsor the National Automobile Dealers Association (NADA) Foundation’s Workforce Initiative, which promotes the value of dealership roles and facilitates access to educational resources.

thumbnail.caption: Assurant, through the Assurant Foundation, donated $30,000 to the National Automobile Dealers Association (NADA) Foundation’s Workforce Initiative, which promotes the value of dealership career paths and facilitates access to educational resources. Pictured left to right: Jeff Strickland, EVP, President Assurant Global Automotive; Annette Sykora, NADA Foundation Chairwoman; Andy Koblenz, Director, NADA Foundation; Enisa Turko, AVP, Strategic Management, Assurant; Gary Bosses, SVP, Assurant Dealer Services, Assurant; Joe Amendola, VP, Business Development & Strategy, Assurant. (Photo: Business Wire)
